entry.title: Susy
entry.summary:
Susy

Getting Started

# Susy only needs SASS, but was built with Compass so install it!
gem install compass

# You might need the alpha version of Compass, if you get errors when using susy run :
gem install compass --pre

# Install susy
gem install susy

# If you want to use the mixin susy-breakpoint(), you also need to install Breakpoint
gem install breakpoint
# Update config.rb
require 'susy'

# Require breakpoint if needed
require 'breakpoint'
// Or update your gulpfile.js
.pipe(compass({
require : ['susy', 'breakpoint']
}));
// Import breakpoint (if you need it)
@import 'breakpoint';

// Import susy
@import 'susy';

Settings

Default settings

// Global variable
$susy: (
	flow: ltr | rtl,
	math: fluid | static,
	output: float | isolate,
	gutter-position: before | after | split | inside | inside-static | no-gutters,
	container: *length* | auto,
	container-position: left | center | right | *length*,
	columns: *number* | *list*,
	gutters: *ratio*,
	column-width: *length* | false/null,
	global-box-sizing: border-box | content-box,
	last-flow: from | to,
	debug: (
		image: show | hide | show-columns | show-baseline,
		color: rgba(#66f, .25),
		output: background | overlay,
		toggle: right | left & top | bottom,
	),
	use-custom: (
		background-image: #true | false,
		background-options: true | #false,
		box-sizing: #true | false,
		clearfix: true | #false,
		rem: #true | false,
	)
);

Map or Shorthand

$susy: (
	columns: 12,
	gutters: 1,
	gutter-position: split,
	global-box-sizing: border-box
);

#susy-container { @include container(); }

// OR

#susy-container { @include container(12 1 split border-box); }

Span Mixin/Function

Context

#susy-container {
	@include container(12);

	header { @include span(2 of 12); }
	nav { @include span(3 of 12); }
	article { @include span(4 of 12); }
	footer { @include span(20% of 12); }
}
// OR

#susy-container {
	@include container(12);

	@include nested(12) { // context of 12
		header { @include span(2); }
		nav { @include span(3); }
		article { @include span(4); }
		footer { @include span(20%); }
	}
}
HEADER
NAV
ARTICLE
FOOTER
nav {
	@include span(4 of 12) {
		ul {
			li { @include span(2); } // 2 in a context of 4
		}
	}
}
HEADER
NAV
  • Link 1
  • Link 2
ARTICLE
FOOTER

Nesting

nav {
	@include span(4 of 12 nest) {
		ul {
			li { @include span(2); } // 2 in a context of 4
		}
	}
}
HEADER
NAV
  • Link 1
  • Link 2
ARTICLE
FOOTER

Location

#susy-container {
	@include nested(12) {
		header { @include span(isolate 500px at 25%); }
		nav { @include span(isolate 3 at 10); }
	}
}
HEADER
NAV

Narrow, Wide & Wider + Break

#susy-container {
	@include nested(12) {
		header { @include span(3); }
		nav { @include span(3 wide break); }
		article { @include span(3 wider break); }
	}
}
NARROW (Default)
WIDE
WIDER

Span() + Gutter Mixin/Function

#susy-container {
	@include nested(12) {
		header { @include span(3); }
		nav {
			float:left;
			width: span(3);
			//margin: 0 gutter(grid context/px/em/%);
			margin: 0 gutter();
		}
		article { @include span(3); }
		footer {
			float:left;
			width: span(3);
			@include gutters();
			//@include gutters(12 1/3 after);
		}
	}
}
HEADER
NAV
ARTICLE
FOOTER

First, Last & Full

// FIRST
#susy-container {

	/*
	* /!\ Override default settings in the entire .scss file
	*/
	@include layout(before); //change gutter position to before

	@include nested(12) {
		header { @include span(first 3); }
		nav { @include span(9); }
		article { @include span(3 break); }
		footer { @include span(9); }
	}
}

// LAST
#susy-container {

	/*
	* /!\ Override default settings in the entire .scss file
	*/
	@include layout(after); //change gutter position to after

	@include nested(12) {
		header { @include span(9); }
		nav { @include span(last 3); }
		article { @include span(9 break); }
		footer { @include span(3); }
	}
}

// FULL
#susy-container {
	@include nested(12) {
		header { @include span(full); }
	}
}

// COOL CLASSES
.first { @include first; }
.last { @include last; }
.full { @include full; }
3 FIRST (no right margin)
9
3 NOT FIRST (right margin)
9
9
3 LAST (no left margin)
9
3 NOT LAST (left margin)
FULL

Margins & Paddings

Pre, Post, Pull, Squish, Prefix, Suffix, Pad & Bleed

// Margins
.pre { @include pre(25%); }
.pre { @include pre(2 of 7); }

.post { @include post(25%); }
.post { @include post(2 of 7); }

.pull { @include pull(25%); }
.pull { @include pull(2 of 7); }

.squish { @include squish(1, 3); }
.squish { @include squish(1 at 2, 3 at 6); }

// Paddings
.prefix { @include prefix(25%); }
.prefix { @include prefix(2 of 7); }

.suffix { @include suffix(25%); }
.suffix { @include suffix(2 of 7); }

.pad { @include pad(1, 3); }
.pad { @include pad(1 at 2, 3 at 6); }

.bleed { @include bleed(1em); }
.bleed { @include bleed(1em 2 20px 5% of 8 ); }

.bleed-x { @include bleed-x(1em 2em); }

.bleed-y { @include bleed-y(1em 2em); }

#susy-container {
	@include nested(12) {
		nav {
			@include span(3);
			@include bleed-y(1%);
		}
		article {
			@include span(3);
			@include bleed-x(1em);
		}
	}
}
HEADER
BLEED-Y
BLEED-X
FOOTER

Gallery Grid

Let magic do its work

#susy-gallery {
	img {
		@include gallery(4 of 12);
		margin-bottom: 4%;
	}
}

Breakpoint

susy-breakpoint() mixin

// small grid: (columns: 12, gutters: 1em, column-width: 4em);
$small: layout(12 (4em 1em) show );

// medium grid: (columns: 12, gutters: ratio 1/2, column-width: 4em);
$medium: layout(12  1/2 show );

// large grid: (columns: 12, gutters: 10px, column-width: 60px);
$large: layout(12 (60px 50px) show );

// x-large grid: (columns: 12, gutters: .25 ratio);
$x-large: layout(12 .25 show );

#susy-container {
	@include susy-breakpoint(40em, $small) {
		@include container();

		header { @include span(2); }
		nav { @include span(4); }
		article { @include span(4); }
		footer { @include span(2); }

	}

	@include susy-breakpoint(50em, $medium) {
		@include container();

		header { @include span(1); }
		nav { @include span(1); }
		article { @include span(2); }
		footer { @include span(2 last); }

	}

	@include susy-breakpoint(60em, $large) {
		@include container();

		header { @include span(5); }
		nav { @include span(2); }
		article { @include span(2); }
		footer { @include span(3); }
	}

	@include susy-breakpoint(70em, $x-large) {
		@include container();

		header { @include span(3); }
		nav { @include span(3); }
		article { @include span(3); }
		footer { @include span(3); }
	}
}
HEADER
NAV
ARTICLE
FOOTER
